pattern.name: Intercept
pattern.description:
Time, when the attribute crosses zero, as estimated with a regression line.
NOTE: Could calculate intercept of two numerical attributes. But it has to be done in a separate pattern because of a cast.
Note: Function "dateToNumber" is automatically translated to comply with the database.
pattern.example: When customer's balance is estimated to reach zero.
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: SELECT @base , ((sum(@timeColumn) * sum(@timeColumn * @numericalColumn)) - (sum(@numericalColumn) * sum(power(@timeColumn, 2)))) / (power(sum(@timeColumn), 2) - count(@numericalColumn) * sum(power(@timeColumn, 2))) AS @columnName FROM @propagatedTable GROUP BY @base
SELECT @base , regr_intercept(@numericalColumn, dateToNumber(@timeColumn)) AS @columnName FROM @propagatedTable GROUP BY @base
